ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: 1/3" CMOS. Horizontal Resolution: 520TVL
IR Illuminators: 36 Infrared LEDs. Lens: 6.0mm. Minimum illumination: 0.0 Lux (IR LED on)
Built-in mechanical IR-Cut Filter Switch. Signal System: NTSC
Weatherproof housing for indoor outdoor applications. Can be installed on the Wall or ceiling
Pack included: 2 x bullet security cameras and 2 x bonus warning stickers. Power Supply: 12V DC 500mA (not included, sold separately)
